text: Édgar or Edgard Anthony Álvarez Reyes (born 9 January 1980) is a Honduran former soccer player who last played for Platense in the Liga Nacional de Fútbol de Honduras.Honduras propina histórico revés a México ==Club career statistics== |- |1996/97||rowspan="7"|Platense||rowspan="7"|Liga Nacional||0||0 |- |1997/98||0||0 |- |1998/99||0||0 |- |1999/00||21||2 |- |2000/01||39||4 |- |2001/02||32||2 |- |2002/03||0||0 |- |2003||rowspan="2"|Peñarol||rowspan="2"|Primera División||15||0 |- |2004||11||0 |- |2004/05||Cagliari||Serie A||15||1 |- |2005/06||Roma||Serie A||20||0 |- |2006/07||Messina Peloro||Serie A||32||2 |- |2007/08||Roma||Serie A||1||0 |- |2007/08||Livorno||Serie A||8||0 |- |2008/09||Pisa||Serie B||27||5 |- |2009/10||Bari||Serie A|||| 92||8 26||0 103||8 221||16 |} ==International career statistics== |- |2001||3||0 |- |2002||4||0 |- |2003||16||2 |- |2004||9||1 |- |2005||0||0 |- |2006||0||0 |- |2007||8||0 |- |2008||1||0 |- |2009||3||0 |- |2010|||| |- !Total||44||3 |} ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Honduran footballers
